key_learnings: Clear visual indicators improve user experience
Force-stop functionality is crucial for user control
Phase visibility helps users understand system state
Small UX improvements can make a big difference
Always think from the user's perspective
Proper implementation of PyQt6 features requires careful attention to class locations
PDF generation requires proper callback handling and error management
